metadata.title: CVE-2019-12615 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in get_vdev_port_node_info inarch/sparc/kernel/mdesc.c in the Linux kernel through 5.1.6. There is anunchecked kstrdup_const of node_info->vdev_port.name, which might allow anattacker to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and systemcrash).

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
